content:
@Eric Haas @Brett Marquard a long time ago I created https://jira.hl7.org/browse/FHIR-9047 to support US usage. Things have moved along a lot since then, both in terms of adoption and also processes, and vocab is (rightly) closing this task and asking me to make a new one for any open issues. (@Carmela Couderc)

Are any of these something we need to act on:

  • DEA Number
  • Medicaid and Medicare numbers
  • AMA and NUCC specialty codes
  • State license numbers
  • Dentist license number
  • PPO number
as far as I know, that's still correct
